New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored 74 not out off 44 balls, the highest score by an Indian in this match.
India won the match by 7 wickets with 17 balls remaining, their second consecutive victory in the series.
Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer's unbeaten 74 was a standout performance.
India achieved a dominant win with a strong batting display and clinical bowling.
Pathum Nissanka and Danushka Gunathilaka's early dismissals were key turning points for Sri Lanka.
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to field first after winning the toss.
Shreyas Iyer was named Player of the Match for his exceptional performance.
Post-Match Reflections: India secured a 2-0 series win, highlighting their dominance in the tournament.
The match was a pivotal moment in India's successful tour.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium in Dharamsala.
It was the 1493rd T20I match, part of Sri Lanka's tour of India.
Others: The match flow included several reviews and strategic decisions by both teams.
